title: Hayward Universal H-Series Digital (HFDN) — Preventative Maintenance Flow
description: Preventative Maintenance inspection checklist for Hayward Universal H-Series Digital (HFDN) gas heaters. Records readings, verifies electrical safety, and confirms proper operation without guiding repairs.

begin_pm.text:
Begin Preventative Maintenance inspection for Hayward Universal H-Series Digital (HFDN).

Ensure pump is running and heater is in service mode.

record_voltage.text:
Measure incoming voltage at terminal block.
Expected range: 110–130 VAC.

record_transformer.text:
Measure secondary transformer output between yellow and red wires.
Expected: 24–28 VAC.

record_flame_signal.text:
Measure flame rectification signal during steady burn.
Expected: ≥ 1.5 µA DC.

record_sensor_resistance.text:
Record resistance of temperature sensors (inlet/outlet thermistors).
At 77°F expect ≈ 10 kΩ.
At 104°F expect ≈ 6 kΩ.

record_airflow_check.text:
Visually confirm blower starts smoothly and shuts off properly.
Listen for bearing noise or vibration.

record_flow_switch.text:
Check continuity of blower vacuum switch during operation.
Expect CLOSED when blower runs, OPEN when off.

record_pressure_switch.text:
Check water pressure switch operation.
Expect continuity (CLOSED) while pump is on and system is primed.

record_high_limit.text:
Test high-limit switch continuity.
Should read CLOSED when water temp <135°F.

record_safety_ground.text: Verify heater chassis is bonded and grounded to electrical system.

record_observations.text: Enter any additional notes, wear observations, or recommendations.
record_observations.default: No visible issues or corrosion found.

end_report.text:
✅ Preventative Maintenance inspection complete.
All readings recorded for report generation.
